title: "Daily multivitamin supplementation improves memory in older adults"
excerpt: "USA: Daily supplementation with multivitamins improves memory in older adults; those who took a multivitamin had a significantly enhanced immediate recall versus those who took a placebo at one year, according to a randomized clinical trial."
